thread.title: ‘Narcos’ Review: The Wars Against Pablo Escobar
thread.title_full: ‘Narcos’ Review: The Wars Against Pablo Escobar - WSJ

author: Nancy deWolf Smith
title: ‘Narcos’ Review: The Wars Against Pablo Escobar
text:
People disposed to spend a big chunk of their waking life watching a series about the Colombian cocaine gangster and mass executioner Pablo Escobar will find nothing to dissuade them in “Narcos.” Part panorama, part freak show—yet with more menace than actual violence—it brings the past alive from a safe distance, again.
The extended biopic, which will become available in 10 episodes on Netflix Friday, takes many creative liberties with the story of Escobar’s rise and fall from the mid-1970s to 1993. Some of them—like... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
